languages.text: "Ты читаешь чужие сердца, словно они покрыты рунами, {name}". {n}Торбальд издевательски ухмыляется.{/n} "Воистину, сей железный жрец изрядно утомил меня и моих братьев своим пререканием. Он почему-то возомнил, что средь нас он лорд".

"You read hearts like they're inscribed with runes, {name}." {n}Thorbald lets out a mocking chuckle.{/n} "'Tis true, my brothers and I grow tired of this cog-priest and his naysaying. For whatever reason, he thinks himself our lord."
languages.original_text: "Ты читаешь чужие сердца, словно они покрыты рунами, {name}". {n}Торбальд издевательски ухмыляется.{/n} "Воистину, сей железный жрец изрядно утомил меня и моих братьев своим пререканием. Он почему-то возомнил, что средь нас он лорд".

traits.locale_text: "You read hearts like they're inscribed with runes, {name}." {n}Thorbald lets out a mocking chuckle.{/n} "'Tis true, my brothers and I grow tired of this cog-priest and his naysay. For whatever reason, he thinks himself our lord."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "You read hearts like they're inscribed with runes, {name}." {n}Thorbald lets out a mocking chuckle.{/n} "'Tis true, my brothers and I grow tired of this cog-priest and his naysaying. For whatever reason, he thinks himself our lord."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “你很擅长看透人心，就像我们的牧师擅长解读符文一样，{name}。”{n}索巴德发出了嘲讽意味的笑声。{/n}“没错，我和我的兄弟们已经厌倦了这个齿轮神甫，不想再听他唠唠叨叨。虽然我不知道这是怎么回事，但他好像总以为他是我们的领主。”
languages.original_text: "You read hearts like they're inscribed with runes, {name}." {n}Thorbald lets out a mocking chuckle.{/n} "'Tis true, my brothers and I grow tired of this cog-priest and his naysaying. For whatever reason, he thinks himself our lord."

traits.locale_text: “你很擅长看透人心，就像我们的牧师擅长解读符文一样，{name}。”{n}索巴德发出了嘲讽意味的笑声。{/n}“没错，我和我的兄弟们已经厌倦了这个齿轮祭司，不想再听他唠唠叨叨。虽然我不知道这是怎么回事，但他好像总以为他是我们的领主。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Vous lisez dans nos cœurs aussi bien que dans les runes, {name}, {n}dit Thorbald avec un petit rire moqueur.{/n} C'est vrai, mes frères et moi en avons assez de ce technoprêtre et de son pessimisme. Pour une raison qui m'échappe, il se prend pour notre supérieur. »
languages.original_text: "You read hearts like they're inscribed with runes, {name}." {n}Thorbald lets out a mocking chuckle.{/n} "'Tis true, my brothers and I grow tired of this cog-priest and his naysaying. For whatever reason, he thinks himself our lord."

traits.locale_text: « Vous lisez dans nos cœurs aussi bien que dans les runes, {name}, {n}dit Thorbald avec un petit rire moqueur.{/n} C'est vrai, mes frères et moi en avons assez de ce technoprêtre et de son pessimisme. Pour une raison qui m'échappe, il se prend pour notre supérieur. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「ルーンに書いてあるかのように心の内まで読み取れるんだな、{name}」。{n}トールバルドは嘲るように笑う。{/n}「そうだ。この歯車の司祭は否定ばかりで俺も同胞もうんざりしてる。なぜかわからないが、本人は我々の主のようなものだと思っているらしい」
languages.original_text: "You read hearts like they're inscribed with runes, {name}." {n}Thorbald lets out a mocking chuckle.{/n} "'Tis true, my brothers and I grow tired of this cog-priest and his naysaying. For whatever reason, he thinks himself our lord."

traits.locale_text: 「ルーンに書いてあるかのように心の内まで読み取れるんだな、{name}」。{n}トールバルドは嘲るように笑う。{/n}「そうだ。この歯車の司祭は否定ばかりで俺も同胞もうんざりしてる。なぜかわからないが、本人は我々の主のようなものだと思っているらしい」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Cala usted a la gente como si tuvieran runas en la cara, {name}». {n}Thorbald suelta una risita burlona.{/n} «Razón no le falta, mis hermanos y yo estamos hartos de este sacerdote y sus tonterías. Se las da de que nos puede mangonear».
languages.original_text: "You read hearts like they're inscribed with runes, {name}." {n}Thorbald lets out a mocking chuckle.{/n} "'Tis true, my brothers and I grow tired of this cog-priest and his naysaying. For whatever reason, he thinks himself our lord."

traits.locale_text: «Cala usted a la gente como si tuvieran runas en la cara, {name}». {n}Thorbald suelta una risita burlona.{/n} «Razón no le falta, mis hermanos y yo estamos hartos de este sacerdote y sus tonterías. Se las da de que nos puede mangonear».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Ihr lest Herzen, als wären Runen in sie geritzt, {name}." {n}Thorbald stößt ein spöttisches Lachen aus.{/n} "Es stimmt, meine Brüder und ich sind dieses Zahnradpriesters und seiner Neinsagerei überdrüssig. Er scheint sich aus unerfindlichen Gründen für unseren Herrscher zu halten."
languages.original_text: "You read hearts like they're inscribed with runes, {name}." {n}Thorbald lets out a mocking chuckle.{/n} "'Tis true, my brothers and I grow tired of this cog-priest and his naysaying. For whatever reason, he thinks himself our lord."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr lest Herzen, als wären Runen in sie geritzt, {name}." {n}Thorbald stößt ein spöttisches Lachen aus.{/n} "Es stimmt, meine Brüder und ich sind dieses Zahnradpriesters und seiner Neinsagerei überdrüssig. Er scheint sich aus unerfindlichen Gründen für unseren Herrscher zu halten."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "İnsanın yüreğini, kazınmış rün misali okuyorsun {name}." {n}Thorbald, alaylı bir biçimde kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Doğru bildin. Kardeşlerime de bana da bu dişli rahipten ve olumsuz tavırlarından gına geldi. Nedendir bilmem ama lordumuz olduğunu sanıyor."
languages.original_text: "You read hearts like they're inscribed with runes, {name}." {n}Thorbald lets out a mocking chuckle.{/n} "'Tis true, my brothers and I grow tired of this cog-priest and his naysaying. For whatever reason, he thinks himself our lord."
